question: The "Pichincha Volcano" is located in which country?
explanation: Pichincha Volcano is an active quaternary stratovolcano located in the North Volcanic Zone of Ecuador. Andes mountain ranges form the parent range of this volcano. The two highest peaks of this volcanic mountain are Wawa Pichincha and Ruku Pichincha. Pichincha Volcano is 4784 metres high above sea level.
